name: beautiful-mermaid-obsidian
description: Beautiful Mermaid rendering plugin for Obsidian using lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid

scripts.release: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); const v = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('versions.json', JSON.stringify({[v]: 'See release notes on GitHub for changes'}, null, 2));"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Coffee
